description: The animals at Barcelona Zoo are thought to have been in contact with an asymptomatic staff member.
title: Coronavirus: Four lions test positive for Covid-19 at Barcelona Zoo
title_page: Coronavirus: Four lions test positive for Covid-19 at Barcelona Zoo - BBC News
maintext: The risk of infection between zoo animals and visitors, meanwhile, is low became of a lack of proximity. "Simply, no one who comes to see [the lions] gets close enough," the Barcelona Zoo statement said.
